com.stefanmuenchow.arithmetic
Interface Operations<X extends Number>

Type Parameters:
X - Operand and result type
public interface Operations<X extends Number>

Provides operations for a specified numerical data type.

Author:
Stefan MÃ¼nchow

Method Summary
 X abs(X a)
          Returns the absolute of a.
 X add(X a, X b)
          Add b to a.
 X div(X a, X b)
          Divides a by b.
 X max(X a, X b)
          Returns the maximum value of a and b.
 X min(X a, X b)
          Returns the minimum value of a and b.
 X mul(X a, X b)
          Multiplies a with b.
 X neg(X a)
          Changes the sign of a.
 X sub(X a, X b)
          Subtract b from a.
